events.name: Internet of Things - Online Bootcamp
events.description: Exclusive Online Bootcamp on Internet of Things / IoT • Learn directly from Founders, product architects and designers who are in thick of things building their own IoT products and solutions. • Especially suited for Entrepreneurs and Students and middle to senior IT professionals looking to get end to end understanding of IoT. http://www.axelta.com/AxAcademy.html Cost for participation is USD 275 / INR 17,000 per participant For more information you can contact me @ +91-9949923705, +91-9908112221 pyush and Manish Note : The training will be for 3 hrs (8:30 AM to 11:30 AM) of each day on Feb 14, 15 and 16.
events.location: Address will posted and emailed , prior to the meet.,, Singapore
